ISSUE.TITLE: modal searches shouldn't be case-sensitive
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY Tried to search for an Organization when creating a user. "default" doesn't return the "Default" organization. This should be case-insensitive. in addition, this ticket should involve going through similar searches and ensuring that they are case-insensitive.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix bug, None was used instead of empty for DB outage (#14463) (#6492) Co-authored-by: Alan Rominger <arominge@redhat.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #13721 from sscheib-rh/feat-add_secret_field_dsv_lookup (#6485) Add missing filtering mechanism for the Thycotic Devops Vault credential lookup
